taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Dichanthelium chamaelonche (Trin.) Freckmann & Lelong subsp. chamaelonche

bio:treatment.description: Culms 10-45 cm, glabrous. Cauline sheaths glabrous; blades flat or involute, glabrous on both surfaces. Primary panicles well-exserted above the basal tuft of blades. Spikelets 1.1-1.4 mm, glabrous. 2n = 18.
bio:treatment.discussion: Dichanthelium chamaelonche subsp. chamaelonche grows from North Carolina to Florida and Louisiana.
